title: Definitions
context: ยง186-1 Definitions. When used herein: &ldquo;Board&rdquo; means the board of land and natural resources. &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of land and natural resources. &ldquo;Owner&rdquo; shall include any person leasing the real property of another under a lease having a stated term of not less than thirty years. &ldquo;Stumpage value&rdquo; means the value that a willing buyer will pay to a willing seller per thousand board feet for trees standing and uncut. This value shall not include logging costs. [L 1963, c 141, ยง2; Supp, ยง87D-2; HRS ยง186-1] Revision Note Numeric designations deleted and definitions rearranged.
